CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Meridian Academy Patrons relative to Silverhaven Polytechnic Fund?
SRP.A: Meridian Academy Patrons is {below} Silverhaven Polytechnic Fund in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aethelgard Arts Circle relative to Celestial College Graduates?
SRP.A: Aethelgard Arts Circle is {above} Celestial College Graduates in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Celestial College Graduates relative to Silverhaven Polytechnic Fund?
SRP.A: Celestial College Graduates is {above} Silverhaven Polytechnic Fund in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total alumni giving rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Silverhaven Polytechnic Fund}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total alumni giving rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Celestial College Graduates}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Celestial College Graduates's minimum Alumni Giving Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Celestial College Graduates's minimum Alumni Giving Rate is in {2022}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Aethelgard Arts Circle's maximum Alumni Giving Rate in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Aethelgard Arts Circle's maximum Alumni Giving Rate is in {2022}.

NC.Q: Between 2005 and 2014, did the total Alumni Giving Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 2005 and 2016?
NC.A: The change in total alumni giving rate between 2005 and 2014 was {smaller} than between 2005 and 2016.

NC.Q: Between 2010 and 2017, was the average total Alumni Giving Rate higher or lower than between 2012 and 2023?
NC.A: The average total alumni giving rate between 2010 and 2017 was {lower} than between 2012 and 2023.

NC.Q: Between 2005 and 2014, was the average total Alumni Giving Rate higher or lower than between 2005 and 2018?
NC.A: The average total alumni giving rate between 2005 and 2014 was {lower} than between 2005 and 2018.

NC.Q: Between 2005 and 2017, did the total Alumni Giving Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 2010 and 2012?
NC.A: The change in total alumni giving rate between 2005 and 2017 was {larger} than between 2010 and 2012.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Silverhaven Polytechnic Fund} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Aethelgard Arts Circle and Celestial College Graduates first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Aethelgard Arts Circle and Celestial College Graduates did not exchange leading positions.
